title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack project management application built with Next.js 14 (Pages Router), TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI) for a modern and intuitive user interface. Leveraging React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, this repository showcases a practical implementation of project management features, offering a template for building similar applications and exploring best practices in TypeScript, React, and Next.js development.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based interface built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, designed as a project to visualize and interact with data from a Robofleet robotics system. It provides a user-friendly dashboard for monitoring robot status, sensor data, and other relevant information, aiming to facilitate efficient robot management and control through a visually intuitive platform.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a personal project exploring modern web development techniques using TypeScript and JavaScript. This repository showcases a [mention the project's functionality, e.g., dynamic dashboard, interactive game, personal portfolio] and aims to demonstrate proficiency in [mention key technologies or paradigms, e.g., front-end development, state management, responsive design]. Focused on practical application and clean code, Raven-v2 provides a tangible example of current web development best practices.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to demonstrate a modern dashboard application. This repository showcases best practices in front-end development with Next.js, focusing on creating a responsive and interactive user interface. The project explores key dashboard features and offers a template for building customized data visualization and management tools.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a personal project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. This application allows users to track their sleep patterns, calculate sleep debt based on personalized sleep goals, and provides insights for improving sleep habits. It utilizes TypeScript for enhanced code maintainability and leverages modern web technologies to deliver a user-friendly experience focused on promoting better sleep hygiene.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX source code for my resume, which is then compiled to a clean and modern HTML version using a custom build process. It serves as a personal project to demonstrate my skills in document creation and web development by showcasing a professional and easily accessible resume.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a collaborative project management tool built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to streamline brainstorming and idea organization. This project provides a visual and interactive platform for teams to capture, develop, and prioritize innovative ideas, fostering creativity and efficient project planning.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based web application built with Flask, designed to demonstrate CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations using PostgreSQL for data persistence. This project, leveraging HTML, CSS, and shell scripting, provides a practical example of building a dynamic and interactive web interface for managing data, covering core web development concepts and database integration. It serves as a learning resource and foundation for similar Python-based web development projects.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project built using HTML and Python to create interactive and insightful map visualizations. This repository focuses on exploring and displaying geographical data in a user-friendly manner, leveraging web technologies and data manipulation techniques to provide a visually engaging experience. The project showcases various data points on a map, enabling users to analyze and understand spatial patterns and trends.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository houses a full-stack IoT asset tracking web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Supabase. Leveraging Tailwind CSS for styling, the project allows users to monitor and manage the location of physical assets in real-time, showcasing a modern approach to IoT data visualization and management using cutting-edge web technologies.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a project showcasing a customizable and interactive event calendar built with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. This repository provides a front-end solution for displaying and managing events dynamically, allowing users to easily navigate through dates and view event details. It serves as a practical example of front-end development techniques and explores calendar UI/UX design principles.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to facilitate simple and efficient voting processes. This project allows users to create and participate in polls, making it ideal for quick decision-making and gathering opinions within a community or team. The repository showcases a modern approach to web development, emphasizing clean code, responsive design, and a user-friendly voting experience.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a personal project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It explores [mention the project's core functionality or goal, e.g., interactive web mapping, data visualization, or a specific application domain based on the README file if available; otherwise, use a generic description]. The repository serves as a showcase of web development skills and experimentation within the realm of personal projects.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains a collection of finance-related projects. It explores various financial concepts and analyses using practical Python implementations, offering a hands-on approach to learning and applying programming to real-world financial problems.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, it provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, making it easier to debug and understand the behavior of ROS-based systems. This project aims to improve ROS development workflows by offering a comprehensive and interactive log analysis solution.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack web application built with TypeScript, leveraging Vite, Express.js, and CSS for a dynamic user interface. This project utilizes the Gemini API to provide interactive and engaging conversational experiences, showcasing a practical application of modern web development technologies and API integration.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a fully functional e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 utilizing the pages router, TypeScript, and React Query for efficient data fetching and caching. The project leverages Material UI (MUI) for a responsive and intuitive user interface, providing a type-safe and performant shopping experience for purchasing fresh produce. This repository serves as a practical example of modern web development techniques applied to a real-world e-commerce application.
